headline: Has The Recent 37% HP (HPQ) Share Price Slump Created An Opportunity?
summary: If you are wondering whether HP's share price still reflects the underlying business, you are not alone. This article explains that question in more detail. HP's stock closed at US$19.44, with returns of 0.1% over 7 days, a 12.1% decline over 30 days, a 12.1% decline year to date and a 37.5% decline over 1 year. These moves have many investors reassessing both risk and potential reward. Recent coverage has focused on HP as a mature PC and printing company that continues to operate in a...

headline: Greenlight Exit Puts HP’s AI PC Hopes And Margins Under Scrutiny
summary: Greenlight Capital has fully exited its position in HP (NYSE:HPQ), citing concerns about rising memory costs and limited benefit from AI PCs. The decision reflects worry that higher component prices could lift PC prices, affecting HP's sales and margins. This move comes as several analysts are cautious on the wider IT hardware sector, pointing to sector level headwinds for HP. HP shares trade around $19.44, with the stock showing a 12.7% decline over the past 30 days and a 12.1% decline...
